candidates.why: Same group (memory), heavy CLI tool selection + structured output patterns; closest operational cousin for tool fallback + safety rules.
Same group (memory) and CLI-based analysis/update flow; simpler than update-full while still centered on context extraction.
CLI-driven corpus/documentation extraction; shares 'read-only analysis' and structured outputs.
Targets related-scope analysis via CLI; similar scoping concepts for load context.
Same family but focuses on compaction; useful for output formatting expectations, less for discovery workflow.

selected.why: Best match for (a) CLI tool selection (gemini/qwen), (b) deterministic phased execution, and (c) explicit safety/error handling patterns.
